seo.title: Empowering Cryptocurrency for Comprehensive Payment Solutions - UnnPay
seo.description: UnnPay is a multi-chain decentralized wallet that enables full-scenario cryptocurrency payment, connects merchants and customers, and establishes payment and collection channels. Download the iOS and Android version of the UNN wallet now, and apply for access to the API experience!
seo.keywords: UnnPay, UNN, Wallet, Wallet, Merchant Payment, Merchant Wallet, Digital Currency, Merchant, Enterprise, Bitcoin, Blockchain, Quantitative Transaction, Cryptocurrency, Currency Circle, NFT, BTC, ETH, USDT, Binance, Huobi , coin, finance, stock, finance, market, IMtoken, MetaMask

navigation.name: UnnPay
navigation.downloadTips: Scan the QR code or click {ios}, {android} to download the mobile client

part1.desc: Connect merchants and customers, establish payment and collection channels

download.tips: An App Store overseas account is required

left0.title: Customer recharge
left0.desc: Generate an independent and dedicated payment code for customers, which is convenient for merchants to collect payments

left1.title: Daily Operation Report
left1.desc: Generate analysis reports on a daily basis to clearly grasp customer deposit and withdrawal trends

right0.title: Customer Withdrawal
right0.desc: Withdrawal + review, safe and convenient review withdrawal process

right1.title: Enterprise management
right1.desc: Provide multi-dimensional management of merchants' daily assets, operations, customer employees, etc

part3.title: More Function
part3.item1: Automatic collection of customer's collection funds
part3.item2: Miner fees paid on behalf of the platform

part4.title: Our Advantage
part4.item0: Support multi-chain, multi-currency decentralized on-chain receipt and payment service
part4.item1: Use smart contract accounts to realize merchant wallet logic and reduce manual verification costs
part4.item2: Provide multi-company, multi-account enterprise management services
part4.item3: Customer independent collection and withdrawal account to avoid confusion in customer withdrawals and reduce manual verification costs

part5.title: Quick Access for Developers
part5.desc: UnnPay can be easily integrated with just a few lines of code. Developers can use our API to deliver faster and focus on what matters

docs.title: API Documentation
docs.link3: User deposit - query deposit address, assign deposit address

step2.title: 2.Download UNN APP, enter the application center to open UnnPay merchant service
step2.desc: Click "UnnPay" in the application center and enter the 「invitation code」 to activate

item0.title: APP Payment
item0.description: A payment product that the merchant integrates UNN SDK in the merchant's mobile APP and calls UNN to complete the payment

item1.title: Mobile Website Payment
item1.description: The merchant displays goods or services on the mobile webpage. After the user confirms the use of UnnPay on the merchant page, the browser automatically jumps to the UNN APP or UNN webpage to complete the payment

item2.title: PC Website Payment
item2.description: The merchant displays goods or services on the computer webpage. When the user confirms the payment with UnnPay on the merchant page, the browser automatically jumps to the UNN webpage to complete the payment.

item3.title: Face-to-face Payment in offline stores
item3.description: A payment product that the merchant scans the user's payment code to collect money or the user scans the merchant's QR code to pay

item1.title: Smart Retail
item1.description: Online shopping mall、 O2O service、 performance ticketing

item2.title: Financial Services
item2.description: Quantitative financial management, asset management, collection and payment services

item3.title: Physical Business
item3.description: Store retail、 smart catering、 fitness club
